messages.message:
The prompts in build (since monday) have given stranger and stranger answers

`list of unique director names as an array and do not include secretaries`
Shortened the query and out of 7 names, it would return the 4th and 7ths answer (order as listed from top to bottom)
Here is the document I’m using

another one
`Return the forename and surname of all company directors`

cc @Nikolaos Kofinas this is a good example for long doc extraction!

I don't think our current long-doc pipeline will support this use case well, because we only grab the top N matching chunks, which might miss some of the director names. It's possible the multi-step converse mode may be able to handle this.

As for the cryptic answers returns by complex prompt, it seems like the default "Director names" prompt works pretty well?
It could also be a good use case for list-of-object extraction cc @Vishnu @Sławek Biel
The director's service address prompt didn't work "out-of-the-box" and I had to iterate a few times and landed on this, which only extracted one address :disappointed:

> I don’t think our current long-doc pipeline will support this use case well, because we only grab the top N matching chunks, which might miss some of the director names. It’s possible the multi-step converse mode may be able to handle this.
Monday I will try this document with the new pipeline (map reduce extraction)
